TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PropertyKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration that describes the type of argument being passed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.View.PropertyKind InArgument = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The argument is an input-only parameter, meaning that it can be used only to pass a value to a method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.View.PropertyKind InOutArgument = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The argument is an input/output parameter, meaning that it can be used for passing a value to a method and for getting back a value from a method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.View.PropertyKind OutArgument = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The argument is an output-only parameter, meaning that it can be used only to pass a value back from a method.
